articles.title: José Feliciano almost got his career derailed at 23. Then came 'Feliz Navidad.' - NBC News
articles.description: This month "Feliz Navidad" turns 50, giving José Feliciano the opportunity to reflect on the impact it has had on his multi-Grammy-winning career—and how success wasn't a given.

articles.description: “It’s an honor to be part of the network’s progress,” the out actor said of his role in “The Christmas House.”

articles.content:
